properties.body:
WESTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
DNC 14, DNC 15.
1. 30 FOOT F/V, FIVE PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND
   ADRIFT IN 19-10.2N 084-24.6W AT 182000Z MAY.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO RCC MIAMI,
   PHONE: 305 415 6800, E-MAIL: RCCMIAMI@USCG.MIL
   OR RCC MEXICO, PHONE: 5283 3215 7915,
   E-MAIL: S2JEMG@SEMAR.GOB.MEX.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1227/15.
